Thank you for your Miracle Message
Thank you for your submission!

Your miracle message has been received and has been sent over to our volunteers to help start the search.

Now, we need your help to help reach out to the potential loved ones, track the progress of the case, and (hopefully) help facilitate the reunion!

There's lots of people here to help! Here are a few simple next steps:

1. Go to our Facebook group for volunteer detectives. Scroll down until you find your message, which should be auto-posted on the date you recorded it. Introduce yourself in the comments, and follow-up on any posted leads!

2. No leads? No problem! Help out with the detective work yourself. Use Facebook, WhitePages Premium (login details here), and other search tools to try to find the loved ones. As you've met the client in-person, you are the best person to reach out to loved ones on his/her behalf.

3. If you are helping out with detective work and/or following-up with leads, go to our database on Airtable to view or edit case updates: go to Airtable

4. If possible, please try to meet with the homeless individual again within 1 week of your initial recording session to share case updates and check-in.

5. If you get stuck or have any questions, feel free to post in the volunteer detectives' Facebook group, or email us at hello@miraclemessages.org.

Thanks and please keep us posted on your case's progress!

Jess and the Miracle Messages team

Miracle Messages
